name: Kurenai no Kishi Rockwell
nutshell: A young knight from a destitute noble family tries to live up to the code of chivalry.

name: Haikyuu!! - Cat Life (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Five years ago, Hinata adopted a surly little kitten – and now it’s a surly big Kitty!Kageyama.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Battlefield Record U.C. 0081 -The Wrath of Varuna-
nutshell: Universal Century 0081, two years after the Battle of A Baoa Qu. Although the world begin to resume order, small-scale battles continue to appear in multiple places by the Zeon remnants who continue to resist. An elite unit, known as the Phantom Sweep Corps, is assigned by the Earth Federation to hunt down Zeon remnants. They are led by Hugues Courand. However, a team of Zeon forces known as the Invisible Knights led by Erik Blanke, stand against them.

name: Esoragoto Note
nutshell:
Ririko has been in the hospital for 10 years. During that time, she was writing a note for her wishes that she wants to fulfill. Will she finally start realizing those wishes?
Spanish:
Ririko ha estado en el hospital por 10 años. Durante ese tiempo, ha estado escribiendo en un cuaderno los deseos que ella quiere cumplir. ¿Podrá finalmente hacer realidad sus deseos?

name: STRAIGHT
nutshell:
A baseball manga about Araragi and Amakusa, two genius rookies on the Osaka Tigers who are exact opposites.
Taiyo Matsumoto's first serialized work.

name: Neko to Matsu
nutshell: The life of a brave little cat and his pet man.

name: Cheerful Days
nutshell: Even if she studies hard, Tsugumi can't get a good grades. She also has a complex about her height. But then, someone starts cheering for her secretly…

name: Touhou - Vajra Essence (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Tenshi, the delinquent celestial and Hijiri, the youkai saint. A match made in heaven, an unlikely infatuation, or something else? minor Yuri warning

name: Sanpaku Eyes Extras
nutshell: All the spinoffs, 4komas, and single-image comics from the Sanpaku Eyes stories.

name: Hikitateyaku no Koi
nutshell:
A collection of short stories:


Hikitate Yaku no Koi [A Foil's Love]
Chie's always played second. Friends with pretty Chika-chan she's only ever attracted the attention of boys seeking the role of Chika-chan's boyfriend. No one sees her for herself. But is that the case with Horikawa-kun?


Isshun no Tsuki [A Glimmer of the Moon]
Mizuho is in love with Shugo-sempai, and even manages to kiss him secretly under the cover of darkness. Only one problem. Shugo is the boyfriend of Mizuho's older sister!


Koibito Kyoukaisen [The Dividing Line for a Lover]
Aya is still a high school student. There is no way she is going to attend an Omiai (matchmaking) meeting with some strange guy! No matter how great this Keisuke guy seems to be…


Doko Demo Issho [Always Together]
Manami is always teased by her classmates for being ugly. Only Satoru-kun defends her. In fact, he declares he loves her! But this world is so cruel… they will have to find another world to live in!


ITALIANO
2) Isshun no Tsuki
La studentessa Mizuho è innamorata del fidanzato di sua sorella maggiore,Shuugo. Un giorno decide di rubargli un bacio segreto, ma una tragedia inaspettata è in attesa …

name: Kiniro no Corda
nutshell:
Kahoko Hino is a student at Seiso Academy, one with an ordinary life. One day, Lili - the mischievous musical fairy who had blessed the original founder of the school - finds Kahoko running late to class.
Delighted that she is able to see him, Lilli grants Kahoko a magical violin, and a place in the school's annual musical competition, which many students in the music department vie to partake in.
Kahoko refuses, only to be pressed on by the fairy, who constantly nags her until she finally gives way to his pleading. She reluctantly accepts the instrument. As she practices her pieces, Kahoko is amazed that she can play any piece on the violin as long as she knows the tune and plays it with her heart. She later gets more attached to the surrounding boys in the competition.
Also contains the Kiniro no Corda 2 (La Corda d’Oro 2) and Kiniro no Corda 3 (La Corda d’Oro 3) stories.

name: Battle Angel Alita: Mars Chronicle
nutshell: Third part of the Gunnm series after GUNNM and GUNNM Last Order.

name: Majo ga Koi suru 5 Byou Mae
nutshell: The curse that can be loosened if kissed and the curse that cannot be resolved is just the kiss.

name: Gordian Knot
nutshell: Stanley Corporation retrieves items at the request of its clients but sometimes the owners give difficult challenges to even just talk to Stanley Corp. They enlist the help of Manjou Yuki, a senior in high school with 99% accuracy on a popular internet puzzle site, to help them tackle these challenges. To sever the Gordian Knot is to solve the challenge in an unheard-of way. Join Manjou Yuki in his exciting journey of high-risk challenges and games.

name: Death
nutshell: A young boy comes to an understanding about death.

name: Mame Coordinate
nutshell: The story focuses on Mame Himekawa, a plain girl lacking in self-confidence, but nevertheless dreams of being a top model. While she succeeds in getting herself scouted for modeling auditions, she keeps bombing auditions due to being from the country and not knowing city etiquette. Her life makes huge turn when she meets a strange but passionate manager.

name: Renai Sokanzu
nutshell:
Compilation of short stories:


Pink Sweets
Izumi is getting sexually harassed by his co-workers… How will his boss react?


Story of Bishounen Love
Shizuka is straight, so how will the little bishounen Toki seduce him…


Cats & Aprons
After a night of heavy drinking, Shino saves a "cat" from getting hit by a car and the "cat" is grateful, very very grateful…


Strawberry on the Shortcake
The beautiful and popular Momo likes to eat while having sex. Can he find someone that can satisfy his appetite?

name: Clover no Kuni no Alice - Air Pocket (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Gray Ringmarc x Alice Liddell
They have sex. That's all you care about.

name: Grandia - 4-koma Manga Gekijou
nutshell: A collection of 4-koma manga strips based on the Grandia video game series by GameArts.

name: Kakumei Senshi Inudou Sadao
nutshell: A strange dog humanoid character travels through the streets of Tokyo riding a giant doberman, spreading chaos and death all around… His mission is to eliminate the human parasites! But is this his real aim?

name: Fool Night
nutshell: Dystopian Body Horror Sci-fi Manga in which humans sell their sick bodies for money to get turned into plants & produce oxygen in a world without sunlight

name: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero (Promo)
nutshell:
There once was the strongest Hero on earth.
"But he died though. How does a guy we killed gonna come back?"
"I know right. But if there was a way to come back, he would come back."
But did he really come back after 20 years?
"What are you so surprised about? Why. Did you do something to feel guilty about?"
You bastards. I won't let you get away with it.

name: Gashuu
nutshell: An artbook of illustrations that also contains a short story.

name: Hirunaka Shikkaku & Heroine no Ryuusei
nutshell:
Heroine Shikkaku + Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossover for Betsuma 50th Anniversary.
The second chapter was released as chapter 47.5 in Hirunaka no Ryuusei.

name: Touhou - Little Blossom (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Short full color picture book drawn in unique style, that may or may not have been slightly inspired visually by Tove Jansson works.

name: Pokemon - Pastel Time
nutshell: a Doujinshi about Touya and N from Pokemon Black & White

name: Nishuume no Koi
nutshell: Yamamoto was in love with Minowa, but never confessed to him. After meeting again at a high school reunion, they get drunk and go to a love hotel in the spur of the moment. But when Yamamoto wakes up, he finds himself in his old home, ten years in the past! While he needs to find a way to get back to the present, Yamamoto also wants to lay his regrets to rest. "This time, I'll say what I couldn't say on the day of the school festival..."

name: Koi suru Moon Dog
nutshell:
Ritsuka is a 25 year old single woman who leads a quiet and average life. Except that her normal life changes completely when a handsome boy who looks like a dog appears in front of her!
Goodbye basic life and maybe even goodbye single life?!

name: Kiraboshi Dial
nutshell: Toba Yousuke-sensei went to Town Alp to start afresh. He got lost and met a queer guy, Suga Kazuhiro, who went to pick him up. The folks in the town were extremely friendly, except for Kazuhiro. Because his room in the clinic collasped, Toba had to stay in Kazuhiro's huge house for a while. What were the reasons behind Kazuhiro’s personality? What happened to Toba that made him to come to this town? With hidden pasts, both of them slowly found their ways into each other's heart.
